评论概述: My New and ONLY Yoga pants!!
类型: Fit Type: 26inchSize: XX-Large PlusColor: Black/ Grey/ Navy Blue
评论详情: O.M.G. I have *always* struggled to find yoga pants that fit properly. I’m a size 20-22 and 5'11", so most yoga pants either don’t stay in place during my workouts, are too loose, or are too low-waisted and constantly roll down. But THESE? Perfect. When I say perfect, I mean *perfect*. If you're tall, definitely get the longer length option—they’ll hit your ankles just right. The high-waisted design covers your hips and waist beautifully, and best of all, they *don’t move*! Even with rolls, they stay in place and move with you like a second skin, but without being tight or uncomfortable. They’re buttery soft—no itch, no irritation—just pure comfort.  They’re true to size, so be sure to order your correct size. If you buy them too loose, you won’t get that skin-like movement and smoothing effect that makes these so amazing. When you first unpack them, they may seem small, but trust me, they stretch and fit *perfectly*, like putting on nylons, but without any of the discomfort. I initially bought a 3-pack and loved them so much that I immediately purchased 2 more. I wear them every day—they’re an absolute dream!

I bought a pack of these in 2023 in XXL to start. They are so soft, comfortable around the waste and warm. I realized I could size down because I am an apple shape. My legs for my size are muscular and thin so oftentimes the knees and ankles are big. I bought another pack in XL and they are perfect! I use the larger set for at home as pajama bottoms. After a year of use, and by that I mean I wore 3 leggings on 90% of my outings because I loved them so much - this year they had deep discounts for Amazon Day and for Black Friday so I bought 3 more packs. I have 12 pairs now (yay!) and I live in them almost exclusively Fall, Winter and early Spring. They dress up or down easily. I think they smooth out my legs more than regular leggings so I feel confident as well. I have never been so comfy! I am 5'3 with 48 inch hips, 40 to 41 inch waist. I am usually an 18 or 20 in pants. Hope this helps!
